outputs.output_descr:
The project will seek to assess the impacts of climate change on agriculture, particularly the major crops of Grenada - nutmeg, cocoa and bananas.  The outputs associated with this project are:-
Ouput 1:  An inventory of greenouse gases for the year 2000.
Output 2:  Identification of strategies and measures to abate the emission of greenhouse gases
Output 3.  An assessment of the impacts of climate change on the various economic and natural systems and relevant adaptation measures : and 
Outpout 4:  The preparation of Grenada Second National Communication to the UNFCCC.

project_descr: THE PREPARATION OF GRENADA'S SECOND NATIONAL COMMUNICATION ON CLIMATE CHARGE
